title: Don't Blame Me
lyrics: Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right<BREAKER>Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life

I've been breakin' hearts a long time, and<BREAKER>Toyin' with them older guys<BREAKER>Just playthings for me to use<BREAKER>Something happened for the first time, in<BREAKER>The darkest little paradise<BREAKER>Shakin', pacin', I just need you
For you, I would cross the line<BREAKER>I would waste my time<BREAKER>I would lose my mind<BREAKER>They say, "She's gone too far this time"

Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right<BREAKER>Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life<BREAKER>Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right<BREAKER>Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life

My name is whatever you decide<BREAKER>And I'm just gonna call you mine<BREAKER>I'm insane, but I'm your baby (your baby)<BREAKER>Echoes (echoes) of your name inside my mind<BREAKER>Halo, hiding my obsession<BREAKER>I once was poison ivy, but now I'm your daisy
And baby, for you, I (I) would (would) fall from grace<BREAKER>Just (just) to (to) touch your face<BREAKER>If (if) you (you) walk away<BREAKER>I'd beg you on my knees to stay

Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right<BREAKER>Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life (yeah, ooh)<BREAKER>Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right<BREAKER>Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life

I get so high, oh<BREAKER>Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me<BREAKER>You're lovin' me<BREAKER>Trip of my life, oh<BREAKER>Every time you're, every time you're touchin' me<BREAKER>You're touchin' me
Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me<BREAKER>Oh Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life<BREAKER>Usin' for the rest of my life, ohh-oh

Don't blame me, love made me crazy<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right (doin' it right, no)<BREAKER>Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life (oh)<BREAKER>Don't blame me, love made me crazy (ooh)<BREAKER>If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right (you ain't doin' it right)<BREAKER>Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for (I'll be usin') the rest of my life (I'll be usin')
I get so high, oh<BREAKER>Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me<BREAKER>You're lovin' me<BREAKER>Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby<BREAKER>I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
